name: A Night at the Top
overview: A noir setting text adventure created by Trygve Jensen. Released on the 17-bit disk #1810 PD disk and also on the 5-disk, Adventure Pack (P). The night was as dark as a pocket, with rain coming down in sheets and only an occasional flash of lightning to perk things up a bit. Three men are coming up the elevator. When they get to your door they will kill you. Think quickly and you may live. Or hesitate and die.... again and again and again.
